name: Battle Box (itch)
description:
Overview:

Battle Box is a game about a box taking on a bunch of smaller boxes in a Battle Network esque combat system, and was made in about an hour. But there is a twist: the box protagonist has a deep, dark secret...he's secretly a crate.

Features:

  • A box
  • A taller box
  • Seriously, that's about it...

Controls:

[WASD/Arrow Keys] - Move

[Space/X] - Shoot

[Esc] - Restart room

A Game a Week [Week 6]:

This game is my sixth game for "a game a week". Every week, I will force myself to make and release a (terrible) game. It's like a ransom, except games instead of hostages...probably. You can follow my progress on twitter (@enathang). Stay tuned!
